description:
Free Nova Games is a website that offers a variety of free online games, including many in the Nova series:

  •  N.O.V.A. Legacy: This is a free-to-play first-person shooter game based on the original N.O.V.A. game. It features a single-player campaign, multiplayer mode, and a variety of weapons and gadgets.
  • Nova-Life: Amboise: This is a free-to-play massively multiplayer online (MMO) game set in a sci-fi world. Players can create their own characters, explore the world, complete quests, and battle other players.
  • Shadow Quest: This is a free-to-play action role-playing game (RPG) set in a fantasy world. Players can choose from a variety of character classes, explore the world, complete quests, and battle monsters.
  • Bombasters: This is a free-to-play multiplayer artillery game. Players can team up with friends or battle against other players online.
  • caRRage: This is a free-to-play multiplayer racing game. Players can race against other players online in a variety of different vehicles.
name: Free Nova Games
